message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet halfway at $1,300,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1,200,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to go above $1,250,000. How about we meet at $1,250,000?
